sentence.Network_en: She was devoted to him, but she no longer loved him madly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一心一意地爱他，但是这份爱不再疯狂。

sentence.Network_en: Five whole pages of script were devoted to rubbishing her political opponents.
sentence.Network_cn: 整整5页讲稿都是对她的政敌的诋毁。

sentence.Network_en: He was single-mindedly devoted to the hastening of freedom for the oppressed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一心一意致力于早日让被压迫者获得自由。

entry.def: Someone who is devoted to a person loves that person very much.

example.ex: 50 years on, the couple are still devoted to one another.
example.tran: 50年过去了，这对夫妇仍然深爱着彼此。

entry.tran: 爱好的;热衷的;致力（于…）的
entry.def: If you are devoted to something, you care about it a lot and are very enthusiastic about it.

example.ex: I have personally been devoted to this cause for many years...
example.tran: 多年来我个人一直一心扑在这项事业上。

example.ex: Horace is so devoted to his garden that he hasn't been away for 10 years...
example.tran: 霍勒斯对他的花园太过上心，都有10年没出过远门了。

entry.def: Something that is devoted to a particular thing deals only with that thing or contains only that thing.

example.ex: ...a major touring exhibition devoted to the work of disabled artists.
example.tran: 专门展出残疾人艺术家作品的一个重要巡回展

example.ex: The shop is devoted to a new range of accessories.
example.tran: 该商店专营新的一系列配件。

means.word_mean: 2. (followed by `to') dedicated exclusively to a purpose or use;

sentences.sentence: "large sums devoted to the care of the poor"

auth_sentence.content: There was a whole chapter devoted to this kid.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was a whole chapter devoted to this kid.

auth_sentence.content: In return that dog was absolutely devoted to her.
auth_sentence.res_content: In return that dog was absolutely devoted to her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In return that dog was absolutely devoted to her.

auth_sentence.content: Ibsen may not have devoted overmuch time to books.

Sentence.sentence: And there are environmental benefits, too: renting a car when you need it, rather than owning one, means fewer cars are required and fewer resources must be devoted to making them.
Newly created state colleges and universities devoted themselves almost entirely to scientific, technological, and engineering fields.

sentences.en: To a devoted couple even water tastes sweet.
Utterly devoted to the people,he gave his life in saving his patients.
sentences.cn: 他忠于人民,把毕生精力用于挽救患者的生命。
